functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Get the address of the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Set the address of the new owner of the contract. Set _newOwner to address(0) to renounce any ownership.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new owner of the contract.
